resources.string: Are you done with the conversation?
Make sure you record entire conversation to get accurate medical notes.
Looks like your conversation is too short to analyse :(
For accurate analysis, please ensure your microphone is working properly and minimize background noise. To generate clinical notes, the conversation should be at least 15 words long.
Please allow contact access .\nTo give contact access please open app settings and enable contact permission.
It seems the device is rooted \nThis application can not run on rooted device
